State: EPI State of Working America Data Library 2024 (CPS-based union membership estimates)
Private sector from union_membership.csv; Public sector from Table 6b (12-month rolling averages)
Source: F-7 Employer Bargaining Notices (OLMS) with reconciliation
Known issues: Multi-employer agreements may cause some overcounting; small states under-sampled
Source: OLMS state/local union filings + FLRA federal bargaining unit worker counts
Known issues: Many states don't file with OLMS (right-to-work
DC distortion: National union HQs located in DC inflate numbers massively - always exclude DC for analysis
PRIVATE_OVER: Platform > 115% of EPI - investigate possible double-counting or multi-employer effects
PRIVATE_UNDER: Platform < 65% of EPI - coverage gap
PUBLIC_OVER: Platform > 115% of EPI - likely HQ effects or OLMS reporting artifacts
PUBLIC_GAP: Platform < 50% of EPI but some data exists - partial coverage
NO_PUBLIC_DATA: Platform essentially 0% - state doesn't report to OLMS
HQ_EFFECT: DC-specific distortion from national headquarters
These states lack collective bargaining for public employees or don't file with OLMS
